name: AVPlayerLayer
desc: An object that presents the visual contents of a player object.

items.name: init(player: AVPlayer?)
items.desc: Creates a layer object to present the visual contents of a player’s current item.

items.name: var videoRect: CGRect
items.desc: The current size and position of the video image that displays within the layer’s bounds.

items.name: var videoGravity: AVLayerVideoGravity
items.desc: A value that specifies how the layer displays the player’s visual content within the layer’s bounds.

items.name: struct AVLayerVideoGravity
items.desc: A structure that defines how a layer displays a player’s visual content within the layer’s bounds.

items.name: var isReadyForDisplay: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the first video frame of the player’s current item is ready for display.

items.name: var player: AVPlayer?
items.desc: The player whose visual content the layer displays.

items.name: var pixelBufferAttributes: [String : Any]?
items.desc: The attributes of the visual output that displays in the player layer during playback.
